content_sections.content: Learn how to create a thumbnail image. Thumbnail Image A thumbnail is a small image that represents a larger image (when clicked on), and is often recognized with a border around it: How To Create a Thumbnail Image Use an element and wrap an element around it. Style the image with a border and add a hover effect: Example Go to our CSS Images Tutorial to learn more about how to style images. ★ +1
